Articles.Content:
So in 0.14 we have a lot of new things.

I know about G and Landing legs but what about switching betwen ships.

Is it only using Tracking stations?

PS if you now some other 0.14 controls can you also say they.
You can change the keys in the settings menu. I use page up/page down for switching for example.

Hello there.

I don\'t want to start new topic with stupid question, so i\'ll do it here.

There are engines with vectoring thrust. But how actually it can be vectored by controls? RCS control keys seems not affect.

Hello there.

I don\'t want to start new topic with stupid question, so i\'ll do it here.

There are engines with vectoring thrust. But how actually it can be vectored by controls? RCS control keys seems not affect.

Whatever your pitch up, down, left and right controls are.

Hello there.

I don\'t want to start new topic with stupid question, so i\'ll do it here.

There are engines with vectoring thrust. But how actually it can be vectored by controls? RCS control keys seems not affect.

The vectoring thurt engine is controlled by ASAS and you using WASD, but it is hard to see. Try to change gimbalrange from 1 to 5 for example in gimbal engine\'s part.cfg

and look what will happend to engine while it is trusting.

The vectoring thurt engine is controlled by ASAS and you using WASD, but it is hard to see. Try to change gimbalrange from 1 to 5 for example in gimbal engine\'s part.cfg

and look what will happend to engine while it is trusting.

...and the rest of your rocket when it snaps in half from the force of the engine. =P
double right click on any piece of junk/craft in the map view and you\'ll zoom to that piece
